event.title: Lecture Free Software and Open Data (online)

body.p: Dr. Lucas Lasota, FSFE Legal Project Manager and Researcher at Humboldt University of Berlin, invites Robbie Morrison to give a lecture at the Seminar 'Introduction to Software Law' about the intersection of Free Software and Open Data. Robbie Morrison is a researcher, engineer and software developer. He is specialist in the field of open data and energy systems.
The lecture will be held online and it is free from registration. The language of the event will be English.

What: Lecture "Open Source Software and Open Data"
When: 16.02.2022 at 14:15 CET
Where: https://bbb.hu-berlin.de/b/luc-b9t-2c7-kr4
